sentences.en: 6-millimetre film was used because it offered clearer freeze frames than video tape.
sentences.cn: 采用6毫米胶片是因为它的定格图像要比录像带更加清晰。

sentences.en: A different wording might make the meaning clearer.
sentences.cn: 换一种说法意思可能清楚些.

sentences.en: But, if you are one of those looking to improve their eyesight in this way, at least you can now do so with a decidedly clearer view!
sentences.cn: 但是如果你是指望用这种方式来改善视力的人之一，至少你现在有了更清楚更确切的看法：懂得看门道了！

sentences.en: Clearer fossil may provide a definitive answer.
sentences.cn: 清晰的化石可能会提供明确的答案。

sentences.en: He urged delay to a moment when the provocation would be clearer.
sentences.cn: 他要求暂缓采取行动,等对方挑衅的情况更明朗时再说.

sentences.en: It is becoming clearer to us that they don't want to do that.
sentences.cn: 我们越来越清楚地看到他们不愿做那件事.

sentences.en: It makes it hard for the Fed to do anything but stand pat till the economy's direction becomes clearer.
sentences.cn: 这让美联储几乎无计可施，在经济发展方向明朗之前只好硬挺着。

sentences.en: It will be clearer if you delete the last paragraph.
sentences.cn: 如果你删去最后那一段，它将会更清楚。
我的职责需要更清楚的说明.

sentences.en: Speak louder and clearer so as to make everyone hear you.
sentences.cn: 讲得再响亮点,清楚些,让所有的人都听到.

sentences.en: Speakers called for clearer direction and savaged the Chancellor.
sentences.cn: 发言人纷纷要求进一步明确方向并强烈地抨击了该财政大臣。

sentences.en: The implications of an agency's action often become clearer as it is implemented.
sentences.cn: 行政机关行动的影响常常在实施行动之后变得比较清晰.

sentences.en: The more truth is debated, the clearer it becomes.
The problem would be a clearer one if the League did not yet exist.
sentences.cn: 如果联盟还不曾存在,问题就会清楚得多.

sentences.en: These concepts will become clearer in the next section.
sentences.cn: 这些概念在下一节将变得更清楚。

sentences.en: This concept is well known to programmers, who recognize that better algorithms are clearer and shorter.
sentences.cn: 程序员们应当十分熟悉简约的概念, 他们知道好算法往往更简短且更清楚.

sentences.en: Truth does not fear contention . The more the truth is debated, the clearer it becomes.
sentences.cn: 真理越辩越明, 真理不怕辩论.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the clearer you put the story the lousier it comes out.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 你写得越清楚,结果就越糟糕.
